**Example 1: 成功**

 

Input: 

```
tccli iss DescribeDomain --cli-unfold-argument ```

Output: 
```
{
    "Response": {
        "Data": [
            {
                "AppId": 1300000000,
                "ClusterId": "********-****-****-****-**********",
                "ClusterName": "上海一区",
                "HaveCert": 0,
                "Id": "********-****-****-****-**********",
                "InternalDomain": "******************************.play-ivc.tencentivc.cn",
                "PlayDomain": "******.com.cn"
            }
        ],
        "RequestId": "7c69cd07-ee8e-4682-ab63-64a2e94d24f9"
    }
}
```
